verbs.description: [ARG1: Whatever adults] [V: were] [ARG2: in the room] [ARGM-TMP: at the outset of Donald Trump 's presidency] are now gone , replaced mostly by sycophants of similar age and disposition to Trump . That and the fact that former communications director Hope Hicks exited fully two month ago ...
